XY Graph Preview Pane (LabVIEW MathScript Window)

Requires: MathScript RT Module

This pane appears in the Preview Pane field of the LabVIEW MathScript Window. Select XY Graph from the Display Type pull-down menu to display this pane.

Note  The Display Type pull-down menu appears only after you select a variable from the Variable List.

Use this pane to plot data on an XY graph. You can plot two one-dimensional variables against each other using this Display Type. You also can use this Display Type to plot the real parts of complex variables against their imaginary parts.

This pane includes the following components:

  • Legend?—Specifies whether to display the legend for a graph.
  • Swap X-Y—Swaps the axes of the XY graph.
  • XY Graph—Plots the data on an XY graph.
